worlds/menus/reeborg_intro_en.json.Hurdle 3:
def turn_right():
    turn_left()
    turn_left()
    turn_left()
def hop():
    turn_left()
    move()
    turn_right()
    move()
    turn_right()
    move()
    turn_left()

    #front_is_clear() or wall_in_front()
while not at_goal():
    if wall_in_front() == True:
        hop()
    elif front_is_clear() == True:
        move()
